member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_BASE64
member.summary: Bytes that represent base64 encoded text.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_BOOL
member.summary: A Boolean value that represents the text "true" or "false"

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_INT32
member.summary: A signed 32 bit integer value that represents the text of the value as base 10 characters.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_INT64
member.summary: A signed 64 bit integer value that represents the text of the value as base 10 characters.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_UINT64
member.summary: An unsigned 64 bit integer value that represents the text of the value as base 10 characters.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_FLOAT
member.summary: An 4 byte floating point value that represents the text of the value as base 10 characters.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_DOUBLE
member.summary: An 8 byte floating point value that represents the text of the value as base 10 characters.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_DECIMAL
member.summary: A 12 byte fixed point value that represents the text of the value as base 10 characters.

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_GUID
member.summary: A GUID that represents the text "xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx".

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_UNIQUE_ID
member.summary: A GUID that represents the text "urn:uuid:xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx".

member.name: WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE.WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_LIST
member.summary: A list of values that represent their text forms separated by a single whitespace character.
